Privacy & cookie policy


We honestly don't know exactly what these "Cookies" are.
But like other websites, our website also uses these things to gather information and improve its service. You have the option to accept or decline these cookies and to know when a cookie is sent to your computer. If you choose to decline our cookies, you may not be able to use some parts of our service.

As for privacy, our site does not use any type of Analytics and the data you provide us when you purchase on this platform is used only to organize the shipment. We store these data on our mail server, and don't share with anyone except for the courier's company who will deliver the package to you.

We promise not to sneak you into any newsletter until you specifically ask for it.

Data Controller: Coward Records
If you have any question just drop us an email
mail@cowardrecords.com
